meaningMnemonic: <radical>Again</radical> and again, your <radical>heart</radical> comes back to the same person. Is this <kanji>romance</kanji>? Are you in <kanji>love</kanji>?
readingMnemonic: But, remember that your <kanji>romance</kanji> isn’t a <reading>ren</reading>tal (れん). You really wanna reserve it for the right person!
